title: Person Of Interest - Season 4 Finale Ending
author: Novus Destiny
comment: when the machine spoke to harold ''when she said father'' I couldnt stop tears from flowing out of my eyes. I cried I felt sadness, a sense of hopelessness . this show is so great.
One of the most underrated TV series ever and one of the best!
One of the best episodes in television history,just masterclass.This show deserves far more then 5 seasons,hope they will receive them,one of my favourite tv shows <3
Anyone notice the look in Harold's eyes when The Machine calls him 'Father'? It's almost as if at that very instance he fully realizes The Machine is self aware.

Just finished the series finale. I thought I should come here.

It was a great serie.

Music : Welcome to the Machine by Pink Floyd
